 â–„â–„â–€                                                                       â–â–ˆâ–ˆâ–„
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ Set in Pacific theater of WW2, Order of Battle: Pacific features        â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ playable campaigns for both the US-led Allies and the Japanese Empire.  â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ Starting from the attack on Pearl Harbor, the dynamic campaign system   â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ allows players to alter the course of history and even win the war as   â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ Japan in the fictional "what-if" conquest of Australia, or lead the     â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ Allied forces from the struggle at the beginning of the war to ultimate â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ victory with the invasion of Japan.                                     â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ                                                                         â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ Order of Battle: Pacific has been updated with special content          â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ celebrating the 75th anniversary of the Battle of Britain!              â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ                                                                         â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ The scenario starts on 12 June 1940 and lasts until 20 September 1940.  â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ The map covers England and the northern French, Belgian and Dutch       â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ coasts. It accurately portrays the changing German tactics in the       â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ battle, first focusing on the RAF airfields and later switching to the  â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ strategic bombing of cities. Several event pop ups help tell the story  â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ and outline the strategic situation of the battle.                      â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ                                                                         â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
